crypto

Class EncDecHashHMac

  • java.lang.Object
    • crypto.EncDecHashHMac

  • public class EncDecHashHMac
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is a a helper class used for cryptography functionality needed in this program Functionality includes Encryption and Decryption with AES-256 CBC , Authentication with HMac-SHA-256 , and Hashing with SHA-256 Initialization should be done with the user's password as parameter to getInstance(String password) , and afterwards a call to get the singleton instance should be done by getInstancce() with no parameters

      • copy

        public void copy(int mode,
                 java.lang.String inputFile,
                 java.lang.String outputFile)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is a wrapper for the encrypt() or decrypt functions in this class that use AES-256
        Parameters:
        mode - can be Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE or Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE
        inputFile - File to be encrypted or decrypted according to @param mode
        outputFile - File result - ciphertext or plaintext according to @param mode
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - IOException NoSuchPaddingException InvalidAlgorithmParameterException

      • encryptString

        public java.lang.String encryptString(java.lang.String plainText)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This function encrypts a String with AES-256 encryption
        Parameters:
        plainText - the message String to be encrypted
        Returns:
        ciphertext the result of the encryption
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NoSuchPaddingException InvalidAlgorithmParameterException BadPaddingException

      • decryptString

        public java.lang.String decryptString(java.lang.String encryptedIvTextStr)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        This function decrypts a String with AES-256 encryption
        Parameters:
        encryptedIvTextStr - ciphertext to be decrypted
        Returns:
        plaintext the result of the decryption
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - NoSuchPaddingException InvalidAlgorithmParameterException BadPaddingException

      • createHMac

        public java.lang.String createHMac(java.lang.String inputFile)
        This function computes the HMac-SHA-256 of the @param inputFile
        Parameters:
        inputFile - the file to be authenticated
        Returns:
        the result of the HMac-SHA-256 computation
